channel.title: Command that summons npc
channel.description: hwo can i make a command that spawns an npc. my server doesnt support the ::npc command and btw im on delta.

item.title: Command that summons npc
item.dc:creator: @deershoot3r deershoot3r

my bad guys your right i should have used the search bar will do next time thanks.

item.title: Command that summons npc
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“Medizine, post:2, topic:375121”]if (command.startsWith("npc") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("king")) { try { int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(4)); if (newNPC >= 0) { server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(newNPC, absX, absY, heightLevel); sM("You spawn an npc"); } else { sM("No such NPC."); } } catch(Exception e) { sM("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::npc 1"); }}

next time just google search it[/quote]
not even
just use the search bar

Read full topic

item.title: Command that summons npc
item.dc:creator: @Medizine Medizine
item.description:
@Medizine wrote:

if (command.startsWith("npc") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("king")) { try { int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(4)); if (newNPC >= 0) { server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(newNPC, absX, absY, heightLevel); sM("You spawn an npc"); } else { sM("No such NPC."); } } catch(Exception e) { sM("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::npc 1"); }}

next time just google search it
